attributes.action: instuct local councils to reduce council tax for those paying annual service charges for leasehold properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a leaseholder I pay approximately the same to the housing association as I do for my council tax each year.  My service charge includes fees for the roads on the estate, the electricity, the maintenence of the grounds etc., Surely a slight duplication in services I am paying for?!?! NB: I am happy contributing for emergency services etc.
